PushManagerRegistrations.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The registrations method is used to ask the system about
existing push endpoint registrations.

blockquote.para: Note: This method has been superseded by the method.

PushManagerRegistrations.returns:
A DOMRequest object to handle the success or failure of the method call.If the method call is successful, the request's result will be an array of
PushRegistration objects.
